lyrics.lyric: On My Own
lyrics.tlyric: 一己之力

lyrics.lyric: There's gotta be another way out
lyrics.tlyric: 前方必定会有别的出路

lyrics.lyric: I've been stuck in a cage with my doubt
lyrics.tlyric: 我受困在自身疑惧的牢笼

lyrics.lyric: I've tried forever getting out on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 尝试凭己之力永远逃脱此地

lyrics.lyric: But every time I do this my way
lyrics.tlyric: 但每当我用自己的方式去做

lyrics.lyric: I get caught in the lies of the enemy
lyrics.tlyric: 我都会深陷在敌人的谎言中

lyrics.lyric: I lay my troubles down I'm ready for you now
lyrics.tlyric: 我放下一切困愁，如今正听候于你

lyrics.lyric: Bring me out
lyrics.tlyric: 救我出去

lyrics.lyric: Come and find me in the dark now
lyrics.tlyric: 前往黑暗中将我寻找

lyrics.lyric: Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
lyrics.tlyric: 身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃

lyrics.lyric: I don't wanna fight alone anymore
lyrics.tlyric: 我不想再如此孤军奋战

lyrics.lyric: Bring me out
lyrics.tlyric: 将我救离

lyrics.lyric: From the prison of my own pride
lyrics.tlyric: 从这个由自傲筑起的牢笼

lyrics.lyric: My God, I need a hope I can't deny
lyrics.tlyric: 吾主，我需要一个无法拒绝的希望

lyrics.lyric: In the end I'm realizing
lyrics.tlyric: 最后我才意识到

lyrics.lyric: I was never meant to fight on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 我从未想过独自担下战斗

lyrics.lyric: Every little thing that I've known
lyrics.tlyric: 我所知道的每一件小事

lyrics.lyric: is every thing I need to let go
lyrics.tlyric: 都是我需要放下的事

lyrics.lyric: You're so much bigger than the world that I have made
lyrics.tlyric: 你比我创造的世界更加重要

lyrics.lyric: So I surrender my soul
lyrics.tlyric: 因此我舍下灵魂

lyrics.lyric: I'm reaching out for your hope
lyrics.tlyric: 我向你伸出双手寻求希望

lyrics.lyric: I lay my weapons down
lyrics.tlyric: 我放下了武器

lyrics.lyric: I'm ready for you now
lyrics.tlyric: 现在我正听候于你

lyrics.lyric: Bring me out
lyrics.tlyric: 救我出去

lyrics.lyric: Come and find me in the dark now
lyrics.tlyric: 前往黑暗中将我寻找

lyrics.lyric: Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
lyrics.tlyric: 身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃

lyrics.lyric: I don't wanna fight alone anymore
lyrics.tlyric: 我不想再如此孤军奋战

lyrics.lyric: Bring me out
lyrics.tlyric: 将我救离

lyrics.lyric: From the prison of my own pride
lyrics.tlyric: 从这个由自傲筑起的牢笼

lyrics.lyric: My God, I need a hope I can't deny
lyrics.tlyric: 吾主，我需要一个无法抵抗的希望

lyrics.lyric: In the end I'm realizing
lyrics.tlyric: 最后我才意识到

lyrics.lyric: I was never meant to fight on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 我从未想过独自担下战斗

lyrics.lyric: I don't wanna be incomplete
lyrics.tlyric: 我不想变得残缺

lyrics.lyric: I remember what you said to me
lyrics.tlyric: 仍记得你对我说过的话

lyrics.lyric: I don't have to fight alone
lyrics.tlyric: 我不必再孤军奋战

lyrics.lyric: Bring me out
lyrics.tlyric: 救我出去

lyrics.lyric: Come and find me in the dark now
lyrics.tlyric: 前往黑暗中将我寻找

lyrics.lyric: Everyday by myself I'm breaking down
lyrics.tlyric: 身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃

lyrics.tlyric: 我不想再如此孤军奋战

lyrics.lyric: From the prison of my own pride

lyrics.lyric: My God, I need a hope I can't deny
lyrics.tlyric: 吾主，我需要一个无法抵挡的希望

lyrics.lyric: In the end I'm realizing
lyrics.tlyric: 最后我才意识到

lyrics.lyric: I was never meant to fight on my own
lyrics.tlyric: 我从未想过独自担下战斗

tlyric.lyric:
[by:KRees]
[00:22.180]前方必定会有别的出路
[00:24.980]我受困在自身疑惧的牢笼
[00:27.730]尝试凭己之力永远逃脱此地
[00:33.520]但每次跟从自己的想法
[00:35.870]我都会深陷在敌人的谎言中
[00:38.640]如今放下一切困愁，为你准备就绪
[00:43.110]救我出去
[00:44.690]前往黑暗中将我寻找
[00:46.920]身单力薄的我每天渐渐崩溃
[00:50.120]我不想再如此孤军奋战
[00:53.980]救我脱离
[00:55.650]带我离开骄纵筑起的监狱
[00:57.880]吾主，我需要一个无法拒绝的希望
[01:00.620]最后我才意识到
[01:03.200]我从未想过独自担下战斗
[01:11.290]我所知道的每一件小事
[01:14.260]是我需要远离世俗
[01:16.860]你比我创下的内心世界更要强大
[01:22.170]因此我舍下灵魂
[01:24.980]为你的希望伸出双手
[01:27.760]放下武器
[01:29.960]现在正听候你

[01:44.710]带我离开骄纵筑起的监狱
[01:46.960]吾主，我需要一个无法抵抗的希望
[01:49.750]最后我才意识到
[01:52.360]我从未想过独自担下战斗
[02:05.930]我不想再变得残缺凋零
[02:08.590]仍记得你对我说过的话
[02:11.350]我不必再孤军奋战
[02:15.730]救我出去
